navigators.smart.paxosatwar.executionmanager
Class ProofVerifier

java.lang.Object
  navigators.smart.paxosatwar.executionmanager.ProofVerifier

public class ProofVerifier
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to process data relacioned with freezed rounds. Generate proposes - good values, verify the proposed values and so on...

getGoodValue

public byte[] getGoodValue(java.security.SignedObject[] proofs,
                           boolean in)
Obtains the value that is considered to be good, as is specified by the PaW algorithm

Parameters:
proofs - Signed proofs to be evaluated
in - True if the proofs to be evaluated are from the freezed consensus, false for the proofs from the next consensus
Returns:
The value considered to be good, if any. If such value can't be found, null is returned

Parameters:

Returns:
True if 'e' is contained in 'l', false otherwise

Parameters:
proofs - Proofs to be evaluated
in - True if the proofs to be evaluated are from the freezed consensus, false for the proofs from the next consensus
Returns:
The value considered to be good, if any. If such value can't be found, null is returned

good

public boolean good(byte[] value,
                    CollectProof[] proofs,
                    boolean in)
Called by acceptors to verify if some proposal is good, as specified by the PaW algorithm

Parameters:
value - The proposed value
proofs - The proofs to check the value agaisnt
in - True if the proofs to be evaluated are from the freezed consensus, false for the proofs from the next consensus
Returns:
True if the value is good, false otherwise

getNextExecRound

public int getNextExecRound(CollectProof[] proof)
Returns the round number of the next consensus's execution from an array of proofs

Parameters:
proof - Array of proofs which gives out the round number of next consensus's execution
Returns:
The number of the round, or -1 if there is not one executing

buildPoss

private java.util.LinkedList<byte[]> buildPoss(CollectProof[] proofs,
                                               boolean in)
Builds a Poss set as defined in the PaW algorithm

Parameters:
proofs - Proofs to be used to create the set
in - True if the proofs to be used are from the freezed consensus, false for the proofs from the next consensus
Returns:
A linked list which stands for the Poss set
